blog.name: tyrusoldme-am-spoilers
blog.title: Theodore James is the ONLY correct answer

summary: TJ was feeling everything at once. He tried to not to think about it and spent the next day in sadness, but with a bitter...
body:
Achromatic: Tyrus- Part 2

TJ was feeling everything at once. He tried to not to think about it and spent the next day in sadness, but with a bitter undertone. He tried his best to act calm and collected in order to keep from messing things up but unfortunately, that wasn’t possible. Even when TJ tries to be mad, a simple heart can make his own skip a beat.

Stan List✨: @tj-is-tgay @swingsetsandmuffins @luzawithoutu @gal4xyfalls @all-about-the-mack @judgemental-llama @yo-quiero-more-iero @tyrusflavoredtea @annielovestyrus @softambi @outhereshippingtyrus @ammaranth324 @lovefortyrus

Please contact me with concerns about any posting.

summary: as many of you already know, @joshua-rush just dropped merch. some of it is cute but idc about the cute merch. i am here to tell...
body:
ANDI MACK STANS!

as many of you already know, @joshua-rush just dropped merch. some of it is cute but idc about the cute merch. i am here to tell you to buy the “there’s no o in joshua” one because it has my tweet on it and i said so. yes it is mind-numbingly ugly. yes it is overpriced. but buy it anyway and also follow me on twitter @lcvetyrus . love ya.

BUY IT PLEASE even though he’s cheap as hell and won’t give me any money for it

summary: Have you seen Josh's merch?👀 He's working on even more.... I'm already praying for your wallet, Sadie
question: Have you seen Josh's merch?👀 He's working on even more.... I'm already praying for your wallet, Sadie
answer:
I’m suffering. As a HOODIE ENTHUSIAST and the official collector of Andi Mack-related clothing, he is killing me. I want the ugly tweet one bc Clairy rights! But he just posted the “you’re no different” one and I’m dying because I neeeeeeed it. 

But like. I still gotta buy my “Shadyside is kinda gay” shirt AND save for my tattoo (which Josh still has not actually written). This is cruel.

But like. I still gotta buy my “Shadyside is kinda gay” shirt AND save for my tattoo (which Josh still has not actually written). This is cruel.

summary: We should get you on one of those react videos where they meet people and u should meet the AM cast
question: We should get you on one of those react videos where they meet people and u should meet the AM cast
answer:
If I lived near LA, you can bet I would have been trying to convince you guys to spam the Fine bros. for me and get me actually involved in the Andi Mack REACT video lmao. That would have been the dream. 

Also if I lived in the area, I would definitely be trying to convince YSBNow/Shine On Media to invite me to their post-finale interview with Josh (and Luke?) since it was my idea (and since I’ve followed and looked up to Lisa from SOM since like 2006). But alas, I live on the opposite side of the country and life is sad.
